com.unvired.chyme.api

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unvired.chyme.api.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    The Message class provides an abstraction to represent a single message in a conversation between a User and a Bot.

    Bots respond to users in a conversation using the Message class. It contains the following components.

    • Text - The actual response to the User in plain text
    • Flags - Determine the interpretation of the Message by Chyme
    • Reference ID - A value that allows related Messages in a conversation to be logically linked together in Chyme
    • Follow Up - A set of possible next steps that can be proposed to the user for use in the conversation. Used to override the default follow up behaviour modelled in the Bots Builder.
      Author:
      Unvired Inc

        Modifier and Type Field and Description
        static long FLAG_COMMAND_ERROR
        Flag to indicate that the Message has an error
        static long FLAG_GROUP_BE

        static long FLAG_NO_FOLLOWUP_COMMAND
        Flag to indicate that no follow up commands should be proposed to the user in Chyme

        • addFollowup

          public void addFollowup(java.lang.String buttonText,
                        java.lang.String messageText)
          This method is used to override the default follow up behaviour in Chyme.

          Chyme proposes as follow up the options modelled in the "Followup - NLP" section in the Bots builder. The static behaviour can be overridden by specifying the follow up options explicitly in the Message. This allows for determination of follow up actions in real time based on the results of the business process being executed.

          Parameters:
          buttonText - Follow up text that is displayed to the user in Chyme
          messageText - Follow up text that the replayed back to the Bot when the user exercises the button text in Chyme

        • addFollowup

          public void addFollowup(FollowUp followup)
          This method is used to override the default follow up behaviour in Chyme.

          Chyme proposes as follow up the options modelled in the "Followup - NLP" section in the Bots builder. The static behaviour can be overridden by specifying the follow up options explicitly in the Message. This allows for determination of follow up actions in real time based on the results of the business process being executed.

          Parameters:
          followup - FollowUp containing the display text and the replay text that is sent back to the Bot when the user exercises the follow up in Chyme.

        • getFollowup

          public java.lang.String getFollowup()
          Returns the overridden follow up behaviour as decided by the Bot in a JSON string

        • addData

          public void addData(java.lang.Object data)
          Collects the results of a command or event to send back to the user as response from the Bot. The data can be a Chart, HTML string, BusinessEntity or a list of BusinessEntity
          Parameters:
          be - One of BusinessEntity, List, Chart or String
